title: Riot is finally adding Wood and Plastic elo??
body:
"To smooth out the player experience, we're adding 2 additional tiers."
https://www.cybersport.ru/upload/comments_img/adc/pogchamp.png

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uYWVx5Kq,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-04-25T20:06:31.284+0000)
>
> &quot;To smooth out the player experience, we&#039;re adding 2 additional tiers.&quot;
> https://www.cybersport.ru/upload/comments_img/adc/pogchamp.png

They mentioned Diamond so probably one up there and then a lower tier I hope called Utter Trash.

> [{quoted}](name=Dragfin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uYWVx5Kq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-25T20:11:29.439+0000)
>
> They mentioned Diamond so probably one up there and then a lower tier I hope called Utter Trash.

Guess that makes sense. I still want them to make Wood at least so I can be a Wood tier ADC lol
where did you guys read this?
Seems like they'll finally fix it so that ranked actually has to do with player skill and not who can get the luckiest placement matches on their new smurf.
